name: Community Engagement Practicum
description: An opportunity for students in the Major and Minor programs in Womens and Gender Studies to apply theoretical knowledge related to women and gender to practical community experience through an unpaid practicum placement in a community, educational or social organization.
prerequisites: WSTA01H3 and [WSTA03H3 or (WSTA02H3)] and WSTB05H3 and WSTB11H3 and WSTC02H3
